htmlBody:
Woot woot! (would love to put some emojis here, but alas this is not slack and I feel unable to fully express my emotions with words alone ::sad face::)

I'll definitely save the date and keep an eye out for the application process in September. Thank you for organizing such an inclusive and inspiring conference. Looking forward to an amazing event!
You can type regular emoji. To a computer they're just another form of text 🔥🔥🔥
